Subject: RE: Bighard: A new challenger in the game
Paragraphs:
Hey Adam,

Thanks for the heads up about Bighard. We've been keeping an eye on them too, and it's definitely concerning. Their product seems to be gaining popularity among our customers, and we don't want to lose any business to them.

We're thinking about ramping up our marketing efforts to make sure we stay competitive. Let's keep each other updated on any developments.

Best,
Jane
